creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Collage with layered images on a large white sheet of paper; image of nude figure, seated on a box, rear-facing, with a camera tucked under PL hand; small piece of paper attached to back of figure, with a black-and-white abstract image; long, thin vertical strip that is a photograph of dark green leafy foliage, with a pink flower in LLC; small, rectangular strip of white paper with a black-and-white image of the bottom half of a nude, reclining figure; square piece of paper that depicts the image of a nude male figure, lying on a white lounge chair; white sheet of paper with an image of a marble bust in ULC
medium: Archival pigment print, with color and black-and-white laser print collage on paper
title: Untitled
